source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_local_plans_dim is created

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_local_plans_grouped

    AS

SELECT hz_ref,
    ldf_no,
    region,
    lpa,
    title,
    dpd_type,
    grade,
    actual_publication_date_reg_19,
    actual_publication_notes,
    actual_submission_date_reg_22,
    actual_submission_notes,
    five_year_supply_of_land,
    inspector_s,
    mentor_named_contact,
    programme_officer,
    date_of_appointment,
    date_of_appointment_notes,
    actual_hearing_start_date,
    actual_hearing_start_notes,
    hearings_close_date,
    hearings_close_notes,
    prep_days,
    hearing_days,
    sv_days,
    travel_days,
    reptg_days,
    total_days,
    days_ldf_ref,
    date_given_to_lpa_for_receipt_of_fact_check,
    date_given_to_lpa_for_receipt_of_fact_check_notes,
    draft_report_sent_to_qa_group_date,
    draft_report_sent_to_qa_group_notes,
    qa_panel,
    fact_check_report_received_from_insp_date,
    fact_check_report_received_from_insp_notes,
    fact_check_report_dispatch_date,
    fact_check_report_dispatch_notes,
    final_report_issued_date,
    final_report_issued_notes,
    adoption_date,
    adoption_notes,
    withdrawn_date,
    withdrawn_notes,
    status,
    total_weeks,
    hearing_close_to_final_report,
    notes,
    lpa_lookup,
    submission_date,
    reports_issued,
    expected_from

FROM odw_standardised_db.casework_local_plans
Where hz_ref is not null
GROUP BY hz_ref,
    ldf_no,
    region,
    lpa,
    title,
    dpd_type,
    grade,
    actual_publication_date_reg_19,
    actual_publication_notes,
    actual_submission_date_reg_22,
    actual_submission_notes,
    five_year_supply_of_land,
    inspector_s,
    mentor_named_contact,
    programme_officer,
    date_of_appointment,
    date_of_appointment_notes,
    actual_hearing_start_date,
    actual_hearing_start_notes,
    hearings_close_date,
    hearings_close_notes,
    prep_days,
    hearing_days,
     sv_days,
    travel_days,
    reptg_days,
    total_days,
    days_ldf_ref,
    date_given_to_lpa_for_receipt_of_fact_check,
    date_given_to_lpa_for_receipt_of_fact_check_notes,
    draft_report_sent_to_qa_group_date,
    draft_report_sent_to_qa_group_notes,
    qa_panel,
    fact_check_report_received_from_insp_date,
    fact_check_report_received_from_insp_notes,
    fact_check_report_dispatch_date,
    fact_check_report_dispatch_notes,
    final_report_issued_date,
    final_report_issued_notes,
    adoption_date,
    adoption_notes,
    withdrawn_date,
    withdrawn_notes,
    status,
    total_weeks,
    hearing_close_to_final_report,
    notes,
    lpa_lookup,
    submission_date,
    reports_issued,
    expected_from

%%sql
-- Build casework_local_plans_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_local_plans_dim_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.hz_ref IS NULL
        THEN T3.LocalPlansID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                                     AS LocalPlansID,
    T1.hz_ref                                               AS HZRef,
    T1.ldf_no                                               AS LDFNo,
    T1.region                                               AS Region,
    T10.LPAID                                               AS LPAID,
    T1.title                                                AS Title,
    T1.dpd_type                                             AS DPDType,
    T1.grade                                                AS Grade,
    T1.actual_publication_date_reg_19                       AS ActualPublicationDateReg19,
    T1.actual_publication_notes                             AS ActualPublicationNotes,
    T1.actual_submission_date_reg_22                        AS ActualSubmissionDateReg22,
    T1.actual_submission_notes                              AS ActualSubmissionNotes,
    T1.five_year_supply_of_land                             AS FiveYearSupplyOfLand,
    T1.inspector_s                                          AS InspectorS,
    T1.mentor_named_contact                                 AS MentorOrNamedContact,
    T1.programme_officer                                    AS ProgrammeOfficer,
    T1.date_of_appointment                                  AS DateOfAppointment,
    T1.date_of_appointment_notes                            AS DateOfAppointmentNotes,
    T1.actual_hearing_start_date                            AS ActualHearingStartDate,
    T1.actual_hearing_start_notes                           AS ActualHearingStartNotes,
    T1.hearings_close_date                                  AS HearingsCloseDate,
    T1.hearings_close_notes                                 AS HearingsCloseNotes,
    T1.prep_days                                            AS PrepDays,
    T1.hearing_days                                         AS HearingDays,
    T1.sv_days                                              AS SVDays,
    T1.travel_days                                          AS TravelDays,
    T1.reptg_days                                           AS ReptgDays,
    T1.total_days                                           AS TotalDays,
    T1.days_ldf_ref                                         AS DaysLDFRef,
    T1.date_given_to_lpa_for_receipt_of_fact_check          AS DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheck,
    T1.date_given_to_lpa_for_receipt_of_fact_check_notes    AS DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheckNotes,
    T1.draft_report_sent_to_qa_group_date                   AS DraftReportSentToQAGroupDate,
    T1.draft_report_sent_to_qa_group_notes                  AS DraftReportSentToQAGroupNotes,
    T1.qa_panel                                             AS QAPanel,
    T1.fact_check_report_received_from_insp_date            AS FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPDate,
    T1.fact_check_report_received_from_insp_notes           AS FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPNotes,
    T1.fact_check_report_dispatch_date                      AS FactCheckReportDispatchDate,
    T1.fact_check_report_dispatch_notes                     AS FactCheckReportDispatchNotes,
    T1.final_report_issued_date                             AS FinalReportIssuedDate,
    T1.final_report_issued_notes                            AS FinalReportIssuedNotes,
    T1.adoption_date                                        AS AdoptionDate,
    T1.adoption_notes                                       AS AdoptionNotes,
    T1.withdrawn_date                                       AS WithdrawnDate,
    T1.withdrawn_notes                                      AS WithdrawnNotes,
    T1.status                                               AS Status,
    T1.total_weeks                                          AS TotalWeeks,
    T1.hearing_close_to_final_report                        AS HearingClosetoFinalReport,
    T1.notes                                                AS Notes,
    T1.submission_date                                      AS SubmissionDate,
    T1.reports_issued                                       AS ReportsIssued,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)                          AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                    AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.hz_ref,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.ldf_no,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.region,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpa,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.title,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.dpd_type,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.grade,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.actual_publication_date_reg_19,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.actual_publication_notes,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.actual_submission_date_reg_22,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.actual_submission_notes,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.five_year_supply_of_land,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.inspector_s,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.mentor_named_contact,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.programme_officer,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_of_appointment,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_of_appointment_notes,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.actual_hearing_start_date,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.actual_hearing_start_notes,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.hearings_close_date,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.hearings_close_notes,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.prep_days,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.hearing_days,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.sv_days,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.travel_days,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.reptg_days,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.total_days,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.days_ldf_ref,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_given_to_lpa_for_receipt_of_fact_check,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.status,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.total_weeks,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.hearing_close_to_final_report,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.notes,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpa_lookup,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.submission_date,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.reports_issued,'.')
        ))                                                  AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y'                                                     AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                                             AS HistoricIsActive

FROM casework_local_plans_grouped T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Casework" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_planning_authority_fact T10 ON LOWER(ltrim(left(t10.LPAName, 4))) = LOWER(ltrim(left(t1.lpa, 4))) AND T10.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_plans_dim T3 ON T1.hz_ref = T3.HZRef AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    CASE
        WHEN T1.hz_ref = T3.HZRef AND 
            md5(
                concat(
                    IFNULL(T1.hz_ref,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.ldf_no,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.region,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.lpa,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.title,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.dpd_type,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.grade,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.actual_publication_date_reg_19,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.actual_publication_notes,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.actual_submission_date_reg_22,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.actual_submission_notes,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.five_year_supply_of_land,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.inspector_s,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.mentor_named_contact,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.programme_officer,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.date_of_appointment,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.date_of_appointment_notes,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.actual_hearing_start_date,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.actual_hearing_start_notes,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.hearings_close_date,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.hearings_close_notes,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.prep_days,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.hearing_days,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.sv_days,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.travel_days,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.reptg_days,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.total_days,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.days_ldf_ref,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.date_given_to_lpa_for_receipt_of_fact_check,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.status,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.total_weeks,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.hearing_close_to_final_report,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.notes,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.lpa_lookup,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.submission_date,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.reports_issued,'.')
                )
            ) <> T3.RowID  -- same record, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.HZRef IS NULL -- new record
        THEN 'Y'
    ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y' 
    AND T1.hz_ref IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM casework_local_plans_grouped);
;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_local_plans_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_local_plans_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
SELECT 
    LocalPlansID,
    HZRef,
    LDFNo,
    Region,
    LPAID,
    Title,
    DPDType,
    Grade,
    ActualPublicationDateReg19,
    ActualPublicationNotes,
    ActualSubmissionDateReg22,
    ActualSubmissionNotes,
    FiveYearSupplyOfLand,
    InspectorS,
    MentorOrNamedContact,
    ProgrammeOfficer,
    DateOfAppointment,
    DateOfAppointmentNotes,
    ActualHearingStartDate,
    ActualHearingStartNotes,
    HearingsCloseDate,
    HearingsCloseNotes,
    PrepDays,
    HearingDays,
    SVDays,
    TravelDays,
    ReptgDays,
    TotalDays,
    DaysLDFRef,
    DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheck,
    DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheckNotes,
    DraftReportSentToQAGroupDate,
    DraftReportSentToQAGroupNotes,
    QAPanel,
    FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPDate,
    FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPNotes,
    FactCheckReportDispatchDate,
    FactCheckReportDispatchNotes,
    FinalReportIssuedDate,
    FinalReportIssuedNotes,
    AdoptionDate,
    AdoptionNotes,
    WithdrawnDate,
    WithdrawnNotes,
    Status,
    TotalWeeks,
    HearingClosetoFinalReport,
    Notes,
    SubmissionDate,
    ReportsIssued,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive

From casework_local_plans_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    LocalPlansID,
    HZRef,
    LDFNo,
    Region,
    LPAID,
    Title,
    DPDType,
    Grade,
    ActualPublicationDateReg19,
    ActualPublicationNotes,
    ActualSubmissionDateReg22,
    ActualSubmissionNotes,
    FiveYearSupplyOfLand,
    InspectorS,
    MentorOrNamedContact,
    ProgrammeOfficer,
    DateOfAppointment,
    DateOfAppointmentNotes,
    ActualHearingStartDate,
    ActualHearingStartNotes,
    HearingsCloseDate,
    HearingsCloseNotes,
    PrepDays,
    HearingDays,
    SVDays,
    TravelDays,
    ReptgDays,
    TotalDays,
    DaysLDFRef,
    DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheck,
    DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheckNotes,
    DraftReportSentToQAGroupDate,
    DraftReportSentToQAGroupNotes,
    QAPanel,
    FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPDate,
    FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPNotes,
    FactCheckReportDispatchDate,
    FactCheckReportDispatchNotes,
    FinalReportIssuedDate,
    FinalReportIssuedNotes,
    AdoptionDate,
    AdoptionNotes,
    WithdrawnDate,
    WithdrawnNotes,
    Status,
    TotalWeeks,
    HearingClosetoFinalReport,
    Notes,
    SubmissionDate,
    ReportsIssued,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_plans_dim
WHERE HZRef IN (SELECT HZRef FROM casework_local_plans_dim_new WHERE LocalPlansID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM casework_local_plans_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_local_plans_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    LocalPlansID,
    HZRef,
    LDFNo,
    Region,
    LPAID,
    Title,
    DPDType,
    Grade,
    ActualPublicationDateReg19,
    ActualPublicationNotes,
    ActualSubmissionDateReg22,
    ActualSubmissionNotes,
    FiveYearSupplyOfLand,
    InspectorS,
    MentorOrNamedContact,
    ProgrammeOfficer,
    DateOfAppointment,
    DateOfAppointmentNotes,
    ActualHearingStartDate,
    ActualHearingStartNotes,
    HearingsCloseDate,
    HearingsCloseNotes,
    PrepDays,
    HearingDays,
    SVDays,
    TravelDays,
    ReptgDays,
    TotalDays,
    DaysLDFRef,
    DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheck,
    DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheckNotes,
    DraftReportSentToQAGroupDate,
    DraftReportSentToQAGroupNotes,
    QAPanel,
    FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPDate,
    FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPNotes,
    FactCheckReportDispatchDate,
    FactCheckReportDispatchNotes,
    FinalReportIssuedDate,
    FinalReportIssuedNotes,
    AdoptionDate,
    AdoptionNotes,
    WithdrawnDate,
    WithdrawnNotes,
    Status,
    TotalWeeks,
    HearingClosetoFinalReport,
    Notes,
    SubmissionDate,
    ReportsIssued,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM casework_local_plans_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View casework_local_plans_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_plans_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_plans_dim AS Target
USING casework_local_plans_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.LocalPlansID = Target.LocalPlansID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        LocalPlansID,
        HZRef,
        LDFNo,
        Region,
        LPAID,
        Title,
        DPDType,
        Grade,
        ActualPublicationDateReg19,
        ActualPublicationNotes,
        ActualSubmissionDateReg22,
        ActualSubmissionNotes,
        FiveYearSupplyOfLand,
        InspectorS,
        MentorOrNamedContact,
        ProgrammeOfficer,
        DateOfAppointment,
        DateOfAppointmentNotes,
        ActualHearingStartDate,
        ActualHearingStartNotes,
        HearingsCloseDate,
        HearingsCloseNotes,
        PrepDays,
        HearingDays,
        SVDays,
        TravelDays,
        ReptgDays,
        TotalDays,
        DaysLDFRef,
        DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheck,
        DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheckNotes,
        DraftReportSentToQAGroupDate,
        DraftReportSentToQAGroupNotes,
        QAPanel,
        FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPDate,
        FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPNotes,
        FactCheckReportDispatchDate,
        FactCheckReportDispatchNotes,
        FinalReportIssuedDate,
        FinalReportIssuedNotes,
        AdoptionDate,
        AdoptionNotes,
        WithdrawnDate,
        WithdrawnNotes,
        Status,
        TotalWeeks,
        HearingClosetoFinalReport,
        Notes,
        SubmissionDate,
        ReportsIssued,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)
    VALUES (
        Source.LocalPlansID,
        Source.HZRef,
        Source.LDFNo,
        Source.Region,
        Source.LPAID,
        Source.Title,
        Source.DPDType,
        Source.Grade,
        Source.ActualPublicationDateReg19,
        Source.ActualPublicationNotes,
        Source.ActualSubmissionDateReg22,
        Source.ActualSubmissionNotes,
        Source.FiveYearSupplyOfLand,
        Source.InspectorS,
        Source.MentorOrNamedContact,
        Source.ProgrammeOfficer,
        Source.DateOfAppointment,
        Source.DateOfAppointmentNotes,
        Source.ActualHearingStartDate,
        Source.ActualHearingStartNotes,
        Source.HearingsCloseDate,
        Source.HearingsCloseNotes,
        Source.PrepDays,
        Source.HearingDays,
        Source.SVDays,
        Source.TravelDays,
        Source.ReptgDays,
        Source.TotalDays,
        Source.DaysLDFRef,
        Source.DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheck,
        Source.DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheckNotes,
        Source.DraftReportSentToQAGroupDate,
        Source.DraftReportSentToQAGroupNotes,
        Source.QAPanel,
        Source.FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPDate,
        Source.FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPNotes,
        Source.FactCheckReportDispatchDate,
        Source.FactCheckReportDispatchNotes,
        Source.FinalReportIssuedDate,
        Source.FinalReportIssuedNotes,
        Source.AdoptionDate,
        Source.AdoptionNotes,
        Source.WithdrawnDate,
        Source.WithdrawnNotes,
        Source.Status,
        Source.TotalWeeks,
        Source.HearingClosetoFinalReport,
        Source.Notes,
        Source.SubmissionDate,
        Source.ReportsIssued,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)
     ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_plans_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_local_plans_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_plans_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY LocalPlansID NULLS LAST) AS LocalPlansID,
    HZRef,
    LDFNo,
    Region,
    LPAID,
    Title,
    DPDType,
    Grade,
    ActualPublicationDateReg19,
    ActualPublicationNotes,
    ActualSubmissionDateReg22,
    ActualSubmissionNotes,
    FiveYearSupplyOfLand,
    InspectorS,
    MentorOrNamedContact,
    ProgrammeOfficer,
    DateOfAppointment,
    DateOfAppointmentNotes,
    ActualHearingStartDate,
    ActualHearingStartNotes,
    HearingsCloseDate,
    HearingsCloseNotes,
    PrepDays,
    HearingDays,
    SVDays,
    TravelDays,
    ReptgDays,
    TotalDays,
    DaysLDFRef,
    DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheck,
    DateGivenToLPAForReceiptOfFactCheckNotes,
    DraftReportSentToQAGroupDate,
    DraftReportSentToQAGroupNotes,
    QAPanel,
    FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPDate,
    FactCheckReportReceivedFromINSPNotes,
    FactCheckReportDispatchDate,
    FactCheckReportDispatchNotes,
    FinalReportIssuedDate,
    FinalReportIssuedNotes,
    AdoptionDate,
    AdoptionNotes,
    WithdrawnDate,
    WithdrawnNotes,
    Status,
    TotalWeeks,
    HearingClosetoFinalReport,
    Notes,
    SubmissionDate,
    ReportsIssued,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_plans_dim;
